abstract: “Are You Smarter Than a Fifth Grader?” and “So You Think You Can Dance” made Fox the No. 1 rated network on Thursday, drawing 7.3 million and 8.3 million viewers, respectively, at 8 and 9 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: “Are You Smarter Than a Fifth Grader?” and “So You Think You Can Dance” made Fox the No. 1 rated network on Thursday, drawing 7.3 million and 8.3 million viewers, respectively, at 8 and 9 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: Those Smart Fifth Graders Pack a Punch
